statements: DELETE FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE location = 'Building A';
DELETE FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE component_id = 1 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM hardware_components_inventory WHERE vendor_name = 'Company X' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM hardware_components WHERE component_id = 101 AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM component_history WHERE action_date < '2022-01-01' AND component_id IN (SELECT component_id FROM hardware_components WHERE location = 'Storage Room')
DELETE FROM component_manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Corp'
